name: Castle Invaders
description:
This is a game where you control 5 knights trying to climb a castle wall, there are a lot of danger and each one has a special skill.

The Knights

  • Blue Knight - Can dash to the left or right according the mouse position
  • Green Knight - The speed knight, moves faster then the others
  • Purple Knight - His sword can destroy the massive cannon balls
  • Red Knight - Always carry his shield in from of him, turning him immune to arrows
  • Yellow Knight - Uses bow and arrow to disable bombs at distance

The Danger:

  • Arrows
  • Cannon Balls
  • Bombs

Attention: The leaderboard system is only local!

How to play

  • WASD or ARROW KEYS - MOVE THE KNIGHTS
  • TAB or X - SWAP THE CONTROLLED KNIGHT
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON or C - ACTION BUTTON

Credits

  • Action RPG Music Free
  • Painted HQ 2D Forest Medieval Background
  • Simple Fantasy UI
  • Interface and Item Sounds

This game was made by johnperes for two Game Jams:

  • ScoreSpace Jam #9 [Sponsored by GAMEJAM CO.] (Theme: Climbing)
  • Mini Jam 59: Fortress (Theme: Fortress / Limitation: Controls multiple entities)

Thanks for playing!
